Structs/PhoenixMessage.html.name: PhoenixMessage
Structs/PhoenixMessage.html.abstract: The PhoenixMessage struct defines the messages dispatched through the Phoenix.

Protocols/PhoenixListener.html.name: PhoenixListener
Protocols/PhoenixListener.html.abstract: The PhoenixListener protocol describes methods of the Phoenix‘s listeners.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13url.name: urlParameters
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13url.abstract: The parameters, that will be added into the URL.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC15res.name: responseTimeout
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC15res.abstract: The response timeout (in seconds). The default value is 10 seconds.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC17hea.name: heartbeatInterval
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC17hea.abstract: The heartbeat interval (in seconds). The default value is 20 seconds.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13aut.name: autoReconnect
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13aut.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates a need of auto reconnections.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC22aut.name: autoReconnectIntervals
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC22aut.abstract: The auto reconnection delay intervals (in seconds). The first try, second, third and so on. The default value is 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 3.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC11isC.name: isConnected
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC11isC.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates a connection status.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13lis.name: listenerQueue
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13lis.abstract: The queue will be used to call listeners methods.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13res.name: responseQueue
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC13res.abstract: The queue will be used to call send’s responses.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC10dis.name: disconnect()
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC10dis.abstract: Disconnects Phoenix. If autoReconnect is true, it will be set to false.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC4send.name: send(_:responseHandler:)
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC4send.abstract: Adds a message to the sending queue.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC11add.name: addListener(listener:forChannel:event:)
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC11add.abstract: Adds a listener object for the specified channel topic and event. Listener methods will be executed in the listenerQueue.

Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC14rem.name: removeListener(listener:forChannel:event:)
Classes/Phoenix.html#/s:7PhoenixAAC14rem.abstract: Removes the listener object for the specified channel topic and event.

Classes/Phoenix.html.name: Phoenix
Classes/Phoenix.html.abstract: The Phoenix class provides a convenient mechanism to communicate with Phoenix Framework Channels.
